title: Provide Solr Ref Guide in .epub format
description:
From the solr-user list, a request for an .epub version of the Solr Ref Guide.

There are two possible approaches that immediately come to mind:


	Ask infra to install a plugin that automatically outputs the Confluence pages in .epub
	Investigate converting HTML export to .epub with something like calibre



There might be other options, and there would be additional issues for automating the process of creation and publication, so for now just recording the request with an issue.

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content: Thread where this initially came up: https://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/lucene-solr-user/201311.mbox/%3C528A1321.4060607@hebis.uni-frankfurt.de%3E

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content: I found a confluence plugin that might work.  hard to be sure how well it will handle the quantity/formatting we use, but i've requested thta infra install it: INFRA-8225

comments.author: Uwe Reh
comments.content:
The epup plugin works realy fine. I suggest to close this ticket.
Thanks to all.
